body_html:
in my case of r0.10, using export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="2", along with

# Create a session for running Ops on the Graph.
config = tf.ConfigProto()
config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True
sess = tf.Session(config=config)

it works ok.

body:
in my case of r0.10, using `export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="2"`,  along with

```
# Create a session for running Ops on the Graph.
config = tf.ConfigProto()
config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True
sess = tf.Session(config=config) 
```

it works ok.
